snippet: BLACK--Maxene, on April 9, 2016. Daughter of the late Libby and Julius Black. Award-winning reporter at WABC-TV Eyewitness News, flower expert, animal lover, devoted friend, loyal family member. Survived by everyone whose life she touched. In her memory, donations to Guiding Eyes for the Blind. 1/3
